argument.name: filepath
argument.description: local file URL of the desired file. (Tip: Use the .phoneGapGetLocalDirURL() method to get the base path of the file)

argument.name: onReadSuccess
argument.description: A javascript function that is called when the file read succeeds.

argument.name: onError
argument.description: A javascript function that is called if an error occurs when trying to read the file.

argument.name: startAt
argument.description: Defines where to start reading data from the file, if specified.

argument.name: endAt
argument.description: Defines where to stop reading data from the file, if specified.
